Package assignment.util

Class ScientificCalc

java.lang.Object
assignment.util.AbstractUtilityClass
assignment.util.ScientificCalc
public final class ScientificCalc extends AbstractUtilityClass
This class is intended to perform scientific calculations.

  • Method Details

    • dragCoefficient

      public static double dragCoefficient(String name, String classification, double Albedo, double OrbitalEcc) throws InvalidParameterException
      Calculates the dragCoefficient of a planetary body using its classification, albedo, and orbital eccentricity.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the planetary body
      classification - the planetary body type ( Planet, Dwarf, or Moon )
      Albedo - the albedo of the planetary body
      OrbitalEcc - the orbital eccentricity of the planetary body
      Returns:
      the calculated drag coefficient
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if classification is invalid

    • orbitalVelocity

      public static double orbitalVelocity(double dFromS, double yearLength)
      Calculates the orbital velocity of a planetary body.
      Parameters:
      dFromS - the distance of the planetary body from the sun
      yearLength - the length of the planetary body's year in days
      Returns:
      the orbital velocity

    • gravityAssistVelocity

      public static double gravityAssistVelocity(double ov, double velocity)
      Calculates the velocity accounting for gravity assist.
      Parameters:
      ov - the orbital velocity of the planetary body
      velocity - the velocity of the spacecraft
      Returns:
      the velocity after accounting for gravity assist

    • gravityAssistWithDrag

      public static double gravityAssistWithDrag(PlanetaryBody body, TransportationVehicle vehicle)
      Calculates the velocity accounting for gravity assist, taking into account the drag coefficient of the planetary body.
      Parameters:
      body - the planetary body
      vehicle - the spacecraft
      Returns:
      the velocity accounting for gravity assist

    • TransportationVehicleVelocityWithDrag

      public static double TransportationVehicleVelocityWithDrag(TransportationVehicle vehicle)
      Calculates the velocity taking into account the drag coefficient of the vehicle.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - the spacecraft
      Returns:
      the velocity accounting for the drag coefficient
